lead_paragraph: Ms. Haley, nominated to be ambassador to the United Nations, was the latest cabinet nominee to disagree with President-elect Donald J. Trump on Russia.
snippet: Ms. Haley, nominated to be ambassador to the United Nations, was the latest cabinet nominee to disagree with President-elect Donald J. Trump on Russia....

headline.main: Nikki Haley, at Confirmation Hearing, Says Russia Is Guilty of War Crimes
headline.print_headline: Trump’s U.N. Pick Says Russia Is Guilty of War Crimes
